title: @Riot Please Stop Removing Items
body:
Please stop removing/drastically changing items. Zeke's is one of my favorite items even though I rarely buy it. It feels like a really good/strong item when I have a team comp that makes good use of it. What's wrong with having niche items? Build variety is one of my favorite aspects of the game and it feels like each role is slowly being pigeonholed in to "one size fits all" builds.

Do you guys have a problem with aura items? Are they considered "hidden power"? First you took away WOTA, now Zeke's, next will be Abyssal, and we will be left with only Frozen Heart and the Aegis items. Are they next? Or is it only offensive auras you have a problem with?

Same deal with Runeglaive. Why can't we have Magus as well? Why limit our options in lieu of giving us more? Are you worried  about our options becoming too convoluted? Because I'm starting to worry about having no options at all. It's starting to feel too casual. Why not just go full HotS and just give us loadouts to choose from?

replies.body: The reason they are updating, not removing Zeke's is because no one buys it... or rarely buys it.
What's wrong with that? Why not just add a new item? Zeke's is really good when you have 3+ auto reliant champions.

> [{quoted}](name=Benny B,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VAp25sMm,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-06-29T22:20:48.311+0000)
>
> What's wrong with that? Why not just add a new item? Zeke's is really good when you have 3+ auto reliant champions.

Absolutely nothing wrong with that. Especially in AD heavy comps, Zeke's is a very decent and fairly cheap way of giving everyone a nice little boost to their overall killing potential, especially in big team fights. That's what it's meant to be, and niche item or no it does the job very well!
